mapper.select: select o.order_num AS orderNum , o.user_id AS userId , o.cr_num AS crNum , o.reserv_check AS reservCheck , o.pay_method AS payMethod , o.reserv_num AS reservNum , o.reserv_time AS reservTime , o.order_time AS orderTime , o.total_price AS totalPrice , o.request_msg AS requestMsg , ifnull(r.review_num, 0) AS reviewNum , '가게이름' as storeName , '주문메뉴' as menuName from `order` AS o Left outer join review AS r ON o.user_id = r.user_id AND o.cr_num = r.cr_num AND o.order_num = r.order_num WHERE o.order_num=#{orderNum} ;
